typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> SouthridgeCustomersOutputStream
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> SouthridgeAddressesOutputStream
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as integer,
		PhoneNumber as long,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> VanArsdelCustomerOutputStream
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ForthCoffeeCustomers
SouthrodgeAddSourceColumn, SouthridgeAddressesRenamedDates join(SouthridgeCustomerDatesColumnRename@CustomerID == SouthridgeAddressesRenamedDates@CustomerID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SouthridgeCustomersAddressesJoinOutputStream
SouthridgeCustomersOutputStream select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SouthridgeCustomerDatesColumnRename
SouthridgeAddressesOutputStream select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SouthridgeAddressesRenamedDates
SouthridgeCustomerDatesColumnRename derive(Source = "Southridge") ~> SouthrodgeAddSourceColumn
VanArsdelCustomerOutputStream select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> VanArsdelCustomersSelect
RemoveDuplicateCustomerID, VanArsdelAddSource union(byName: true)~> SouthridgeVanarsdelUnion
SouthridgeCustomersAddressesJoinOutputStream select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = SouthridgeCustomerDatesColumnRename@CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		Source,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveDuplicateCustomerID
VanArsdelCustomersSelect derive(Source = 'VanArsdel',
		ZipCode = toString(ZipCode),
		CreatedDate = toDate(CreatedDate),
		UpdatedDate = toDate(UpdatedDate),
		PhoneNumber = toString(PhoneNumber)) ~> VanArsdelAddSource
ForthCoffeeCustomers derive(CreatedDate = toDate(CreatedDate, "yyyy-MM-dd"),
		UpdatedDate = toDate(UpdatedDate, "yyyy-MM-dd"),
		Source = "ForthCoffee") ~> ForthCoffeeFormatDates
ForthCoffeeFormatDates, SouthridgeVanarsdelUnion union(byName: true)~> ForthCoffeeAndRestUnion
ForthCoffeeAndRestUnion sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SouthridgeCustomersSink
